title: Recruiting Bronze (Yes Bronze)
body:
HI

U know i am making a team (i'm already the captain of one, but that's for friends and for fun)
But the new one im making will be for STRICTLY bronze players that want to get serious about LoL

please contact me if ur interested!!

(NOTE: I am making the team today)

replies.body: PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD WE STILL NEED 5 MORE PEOPLE TO MAKE THE BRONZE SQUAD, THIS IS FOR COMPETITIVE AND ALSO FOR BRONZIES TO HAVE A CHANCE IN LoL

Check my profile out... I main ADC and MID main champs for adc are Quinn, Varus and Mid i have a variety of champs...
IGN is Critterous (if u didn't see it on the top of this message) 
But yea contact me
Hi, I play pantheon jungle and gnar top. My win rate with panth is uber noice. :^)

Hello guys i hav bad news:

The team is full, so sadly i cant invite anymore people
But i hope u make ur own Bronze teams and not be afraid to do so, like i hav done so :D

yo im currently bronze 1 looking a team to join the open ladder :)
add uK Viisionz

ign is greatdeathz add me, more then happy to talk out times and arrangements on when to play etc... i wouldnt mind trying to learn with a team instead of solo queing all the time, if u ever want to duo que in norms to see how i play am more then happy to do that i main support but can do other roles if needed
thats fine i can jg and adc better at adc add me if u want?
Hi. I main adc and support. i am unranked atm but have been bronze the past two seasons. would love to join a team :D
Hey OpelStorm, ur our new supp (but sadly u'll be our 2nd pref, but it's better than nothing)
jungle/sup pref can do other roles but they my best roles always chill never range and bronze 4 right now
U will be our jungle!!! :D (and if there is no supp then u must be the supp)

IGN: Fishyyyys
Roles (highest preference): Mid, Adc, Top (not much variety TOP)
Can you accept non preferred roles: Yes
Availability: Everyday after 3Pm.
Age: 21
Rank: Bronze 3
OKA u will be recruited as our top and fill :D
are you sure you want to hurt yourself like that?
Dude the only reason im making a BRONZE TEAM is because the Bronzies are never given a chance in Ranked Teams, they're usually the last pick for everything, SO THIS IS FOR THE BRONZIES :D

It's so weird, I had this idea last week, and made a team (only ended playing one game that night).
But since then I have since two posts (one on FB and the OP's) looking for the same thing.

I'm glad people are catching on that Bronzies can be taught the basic strategy and climb regardless of mechanics.
